cbccore.motors.statemotors
Interface IAdvancedStateMotor

All Superinterfaces:
IStateMotor
All Known Subinterfaces:
IBlockingAdvancedStateMotor
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractAdvancedStateMotor, AbstractBlockingAdvancedStateMotor, CoefficientAdvancedStateMotor, CoefficientBlockingAdvancedStateMotor, ComposedAdvancedStateMotor, ComposedBlockingAdvancedStateMotor, Motor, OffsetAdvancedStateMotor, OffsetBlockingAdvancedStateMotor, PivotingWheel, RestorePointMotor, Servo, Wheel, Wheel
public interface IAdvancedStateMotor
extends IStateMotor

All the functions defined in here in implementing classes should be non-blocking. For varients with blocking support, one should implement IBlockingAdvancedStateMotor.

Author:
Benjamin Woodruff
